# referenceImage

**Instance Property**

The detected image referenced by the image anchor.

## Declaration

```swift
var referenceImage: ARReferenceImage { get }
```

## Discussion

This object is always one of the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARReferenceImage] objects you provided in the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldTrackingConfiguration/detectionImages] array when configuring the session.
title: referenceImage
